data.title: Revolve Group net sales grow as AI's role expands for shoppers
data.description: Revolve's co-CEO's touted benefits from AI as net sales increased by 10.4% year over year in the retailers fiscal Q4 earnings results.

data.title: BlueLinx bets on AI as it navigates a soft housing market
data.description: While the company ran ecommerce pilots, executives said they are placing greater emphasis on supporting several large customers with their own advanced digital platforms — and keeping flexibility as AI changes how buying may begin.

data.title: Resideo pushes connected products and digital buying tools
data.description: Resideo’s strategy heading into 2026 centers on tying connected devices more closely to its distribution and digital platforms, making it easier for professionals to research, configure and purchase products online.

data.title: Mirakl turns profitable as recurring revenue and marketplace activity grows
data.description: “Agentic commerce is the most significant transformation in digital buying since the rise of ecommerce itself,” said co-founder and co-chief executive Philippe Corrot.

data.title: ACV Auctions expands AI tools as Q4 revenue rises
data.description: The company said it sold 829,276 vehicles through its platform in 2025, up 12% from 2024. At the same time, the total value of vehicles sold climbed 9% to $10.4 billion.
